title: reinstalling client taking forever
body: downloading the client again in an attempt to fix another issue i've been having in game, but the now the client is downloading at roughly 300kbs. Wondering if anyone has had the same issue?

replies.body:
Sometimes your own internet can be in tip-top shape but still have a hard time getting a solid connection to specific servers. It sounds like this might be the case here since you were able to post just fine and that download should probably be moving quite a bit faster. 

You should be able to nudge that download along a little faster by switching to a hardwired connection if you aren't using one already. Let's also double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case to see if there's anything we could update there to make things smoother.
